title: Babies need books
creator_credit: New Zealand Broadcasting Corporation and New Zealand Trade & Enterprise
brief_description: A mother, grandmother, teacher and children’s bookseller, Dorothy Butler believes that books should play a crucial role in children’s lives right from the first months. The film is an informative and entertaining introduction to 58 favourite children’s books.
